title: Levi & Korsinsky, LLP Announces an Investigation Involving Possible Breaches of Fiduciary Duty by the Board of Imation Corp.
text: Levi & Korsinsky, LLP Announces an Investigation Involving Possible Breaches of Fiduciary Duty by the Board of Imation Corp.   13:45:03 SHAREHOLDER ALERT: Levi & Korsinsky, LLP Announces an Investigation Involving Possible Breaches... -- NEW YORK, Oct. 20,   Protecting the Rights of Shareholders Protecting the Rights of Shareholders  ><- stripped tags -> NEW YORK , Oct. 20,   Levi & Korsinsky announces it has commenced an investigation of Imation Corp. (NYSE: [[]]) concerning possible breaches of fiduciary duty by the board of directors of the company. To obtain additional information, go to : [[UEdFZ2NtVnNQVndpYm05bWIyeHNiM2RjSWlCdmJtTnNhV05yUFNkc2FXNXJUMjVEYkdsamF5aDBhR2x6S1NjZ2FISmxaajFjSW1oMGRIQTZMeTk2YkdzdU9XNXNMbU52YlM5cGJXRjBhVzl1TFdsdGJsd2lJSEpsYkQxY0ltNXZabTlzYkc5M1hDSWdkR0Z5WjJWMFBWd2lYMkpzWVc1clhDSStQR0krYUhSMGNEb3ZMM3BzYXk0NWJtd3VZMjl0TDJsdFlYUnBiMjR0YVcxdVBDOWlQand2WVQ0PXw=]] or contact Joseph E. Levi, Esq. either via email at [[UEdFZ2NtVnNQVndpYm05bWIyeHNiM2RjSWlCdmJtTnNhV05yUFNkc2FXNXJUMjVEYkdsamF5aDBhR2x6S1NjZ2FISmxaajFjSW0xaGFXeDBienBxYkdWMmFVQjZiR3N1WTI5dFhDSWdjbVZzUFZ3aWJtOW1iMnhzYjNkY0lpQjBZWEpuWlhROVhDSmZZbXhoYm10Y0lqNXFiR1YyYVVCNmJHc3VZMjl0UEM5aFBnPT18]] or by telephone at (212) 363-7500, toll-free: (877) 363-5972. Levi & Korsinsky is a national firm with offices in New York , New Jersey , Connecticut and Washington D.C. The firm's attorneys have extensive expertise in prosecuting securities litigation involving financial fraud, representing investors throughout the nation in securities and shareholder lawsuits. Attorney advertising. Prior results do not guarantee similar outcomes. CONTACT:
